overview:
I have a reputation for: creativity, attention to detail, and insight in the delivery of research services.

I have worked with national and global companies in the past including: Procter & Gamble, GlaxoSmithKline, Shaw Flooring, Colgate, Andersen Windows, Sears Holdings Corporation, Discovery Channel, and Sprint to name a few.

I am self-motivated with high energy and thrive in a fast paced and deadline driven environment.
